Smriti's teammates joined the joyous occasion, dancing with the bride.  Earlier, Palash shared a touching proposal video from DY Patil Stadium. With the wedding set for November 23, 2025, excitement is palpable for the couple.

description: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi's electrifying 15-ball 38, featuring four sixes, ignited India A's pursuit of 195 in the Asia Cup Rising Stars semifinal. His aggressive start, coupled with a 53-run opening stand, propelled the team to a strong position. Despite a brief slowdown after his dismissal, India A remains in a commanding chase.

Toxic air chokes playgrounds: Delhi schools halt outdoor sports amid high AQI
description: The Directorate of Education (DoE) has suspended all outdoor sports activities in Delhi schools as air quality worsens, following concerns raised by the Supreme Court (SC) and directions from the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM). With AQI levels reaching the ‘severe’ category in several localities, including a high of 442 in Wazirpur, schools have cancelled sports schedules and shifted to indoor plans. Meanwhile, the Delhi government announced long-term school modernisation with AI-enabled tools and upgraded infrastructure.

Tejas fighter jet crashes in Dubai during air show; IAF confirms pilot dead
description: Tragedy struck the Dubai Air Show as an Indian Air Force Tejas fighter jet crashed during an aerobatic display, resulting in the pilot's fatal injuries. The HAL-built aircraft nosedived, causing a massive fireball and panic among spectators. Emergency teams responded swiftly to the incident. The IAF expressed deep regret over the loss of life.

India's 'musical-chair' story: Gambhir & No.3 conundrum - 7 batters in 18 Tests
description: India's Test struggles at home are amplified by the constant shuffling at the No.3 batting position. Under coach Gautam Gambhir, seven different batters have occupied this crucial slot in just 18 Tests, raising concerns about stability and planning. This instability at one-down has become a focal point as Team India seeks to regain balance in their red-ball setup.

description: Procrastinating on investing due to fear of market timing is a common pitfall, costing individuals significant wealth over time. description: Google has launched Nano Banana Pro, an advanced AI image generator powered by Gemini 3. This upgrade offers superior reasoning, enhanced world knowledge, and precise text rendering. 'All 140 MLAs are mine': DK Shivakumar on Karnataka CM post; Siddaramaiah responds
description: Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar asserted that all 140 MLAs are his, dismissing speculation about groupism amid cabinet reshuffle talks. Chief Minister Siddaramaiah clarified that cabinet decisions rest with the high command, stating he will present the next budget and continue his term. Why the Internet keeps going down every few weeks
description: The internet experiences major outages every few weeks due to increasing centralisation—AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure now power most online services, creating single points of failure. Technical issues like DNS problems, configuration errors, and automation failures cascade across interconnected systems. Despite redundancy efforts, these outages disrupt emergency services, banking, and transportation.The decentralised internet envisioned for resilience has become a fragile network dependent on a few massive providers.

title: Rs 95 lakh per semester paid for Karisma's daughter, Priya's lawyer shows receipt in court
description: A Delhi High Court hearing saw Priya Kapur's legal team present strong evidence refuting claims of a forged will by Sunjay Kapur. Documentation, including fee receipts and digital trails, countered allegations, while the court examined the will's creation and authenticity. The case continues on November 21.

title: 'It’s been hard': Brittany Mahomes opens up on emotional toll of NFL spotlight
description: Brittany Mahomes, wife of NFL star Patrick Mahomes, has candidly shared her struggles with online hate. She revealed that while it's been a difficult journey, she's learned to protect her peace by stepping away from social media when negativity escalates. Despite facing criticism for her opinions and public presence, she remains a strong supporter of her husband and their family.

title: Savannah James gets emotional as daughter Zhuri joins new SZN Volleyball team
description: Savannah James celebrated her daughter Zhuri Nova's milestone as she begins her volleyball journey with the popular SZN team. Despite her family's basketball background, Zhuri Nova chose a different athletic path. The proud mother shared heartwarming clips and reflected on Zhuri Nova's 11th birthday, highlighting her daughter's intelligence and confidence.

title: A nation unravels: Is al-Qaida about to get its very own country? Explained
description: Mali is on the brink of falling under the control of al-Qaida's regional affiliate, JNIM, marking a significant shift in West African power dynamics. The group has implemented a sophisticated strategy, effectively strangling the state and establishing a shadow administration. This unfolding crisis threatens to create a vast arc of jihadist influence across the Sahel, with profound global implications.

title: Stephen Curry’s wife earns major nomination at 2025 Glossy Beauty Awards
description: Ayesha Curry's beauty brand, Sweet July Skin, has earned a nomination for Best Category Launch at the 2025 Glossy Beauty and Wellness Awards for its successful Lip Treatment. This recognition follows previous accolades for the brand, highlighting its growing impact in the beauty industry. The winners will be revealed on December 2, 2025.

title: LiAngelo ball goes platinum with breakout hit “Tweaker” featuring Drake
description: LiAngelo Ball, formerly a basketball player, has achieved a major milestone in music. His debut single 'Tweaker' has gone platinum. This success signifies a significant crossover from sports to the entertainment industry. The song became a cultural phenomenon, embraced by sports teams and charting highly. Ball's journey redefines his public identity and highlights his artistic ambition.
